english.segment1: I have pride, He is meek. I have shame, He is glory. I'm deceitful, He is truthful. I'm not worthy but He is the giver
english.segment2: His death for my life. God and I. If apart from Him, I know I will surely, surely die. I know that I'm not much to give. It's only for His love that I have my life to live
english.segment3: He has fullness, I am so empty. He is love, I need so much love. He is always there, I am always found. He is the giver, I'm not worthy
english.segment4: His death for my life. God and I. If apart from Him, I know I will surely, surely die. I know that I'm not much to give. It's only for His love that I have my life to live
